comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: From the car, the timing (before the first game of the World Series) and the position of Larry Doyle (seated on the running board), I'm going to say this was the award ceremony for the National League MVP (known then as the Chalmers Award, and accompanied by a Chalmers vehicle) to Larry Doyle. This matches up with other Chalmers Award photos in the Bain Collection.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: artolog:  Thanks for your comment about the Chalmers award photos.  We will include some information about it in the description for this and the other images which you have identified.
